column4: Hey, I recently changed my login password, but when I first turn on my computer the new password won't work. So I have to use my old password, but the thing is once my computer goes to screen saver after 5 minutes and I have to login again, then I'll have to use my new password. Its a little strange, so I was wondering if there are two different passwords that needed to be changed, or if this is some kind of fluke. Any thoughts?
maybe you changed the user pass and not root pass?
that makes sense, but where would I go to change my root pass?
unfortunately that im not sure of
